name: Cube Defender (itch)
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 26

Keys:
Q = Rotate walkable area left
E = Rotate walkable area right
Arrows = Move and fire

Return = Restart if you get stuck.

The world is encroaching on your minimalist space. Your aim to to rid the world of coloured blocks until only you remain.

The player is in the centre. It will fire bullets of the same colour. Bullets will destroy blocks of the same colour. If a bullet hits a block not of the same colour, the player's colour changes to that of the block.

Like Solitaire, it is possible for the game to be un-winable but skilful play minimises this chance.
